price: (Ó tún jẹ́) oníwà rere sí àwọn òbí rẹ̀ méjèèjì. Kò sì jẹ́ ajẹninípá, olùyapa.
arabic: وَبَرَّۢا بِوَٰلِدَيۡهِ وَلَمۡ يَكُن جَبَّارًا عَصِيّٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wabarran biwālidayhi walam yakun jabbāran ʿaṣiyyan
